title: CYBER_COWBOY
author: CYBER_COWBOY
created_time: August 04, 2023, 03:32:15 PMLast edit: August 04, 2023, 04:46:48 PM by CYBER_COWBOY
content: I want  24 hours collateral BTC loan. I want to lend 0.0026BTC and I pay back 0.0030BTCThe collateral I can offer is: Dogecoin or BCH. I know I have feedback for never ask for a loan.But I think a COLLATERAL loan  not the same as non collateral, since a scam can't happen.

comments.author: suchmoon
comments.body: Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on July 09, 2023, 02:49:27 PMI will never been needing a loan in the near future (ever)Maybe I won't be a newbie forever and would be granted a loan in the future, and this thing was a very smart idéa to avoid problems like these (if my account would end up hacked in the future)Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on August 04, 2023, 03:32:15 PMI  think a collateral 24 hour loan is another story.Oh, watch out we got a "thinker" here LOLJesus fucking Christ, even scammers got stupider while I was out.

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY
comments.created_time: August 04, 2023, 03:45:09 PMLast edit: August 04, 2023, 03:55:45 PM by CYBER_COWBOY
comments.body: Quote from: suchmoon on August 04, 2023, 03:43:34 PMQuote from: CYBER_COWBOY on July 09, 2023, 02:49:27 PMI will never been needing a loan in the near future (ever)Maybe I won't be a newbie forever and would be granted a loan in the future, and this thing was a very smart idéa to avoid problems like these (if my account would end up hacked in the future)Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on August 04, 2023, 03:32:15 PMI  think a collateral 24 hour loan is another story.Oh, watch out we got a "thinker" here LOLJesus fucking Christ, even scammers got stupider while I was out.Excuse me? I did ask for a collateral loan, not a non-collateral loan, because I can't access my BTC at the moment, so I would send the collateral first and then I would get the BTC. and I would not get the collateral back before I send back the lending amount + interest, are you joking with me? How could I scam anyone with that?? You should think before you speak next time and giving out feedback.I lending out money to people on this forum, not scam people. I got a active loan to a user right now as we speak.If you think I am lying I can show you that I got the money. and you can also check this: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5445759.msg62587912#msg62587912Remove your feedback now please.

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on August 04, 2023, 03:45:09 PMExcuse me? I did ask for a collateral loan, not a non-collateral loan, because I can't access my BTC at the moment, so I would send the collateral first and then I would get the BTC. and I would not get the collateral back before I send back the lending amount + interest, are you joking with me? How could I scam anyone with that??Collateral scams aren't a new thing, I've seen it many times.Either way, you ticked all the bad boxes asking this. If you have Dogecoin or BCH, use an instant exchanger. That's even cheaper than paying 0.0004BTC in interest, so your request doesn't make any sense.

comments.author: suchmoon
comments.body: Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on August 04, 2023, 03:45:09 PMExcuse me? I did ask for a collateral loan, not a non-collateral loan. How could I scam anyone with that?You said you will never ask for a loan (didn't specify collateral or not, just any loan). They you asked for a loan. That makes you untrustworthy. I'm not going to provide you with instructions how to scam on a collateral loan, but there are other issues with such loans as well, not the least of which is trust farming leading to a long con.Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on August 04, 2023, 03:45:09 PMI lending out money to people on this forum.Good luck with that. Maybe try actually having money so that you don't need to borrow yourself.Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on August 04, 2023, 03:45:09 PMRemove your feedback now.Sure. Anything else you'd like me to do for you while I'm at your service?

They you asked for a loan. That makes you untrustworthy. Maybe try actually having money so that you don't need to borrow yourself.Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on August 04, 2023, 03:45:09 PMRemove your feedback now.I have a good economy, I did ask for a 24 hour collateral loan and you giving me negative feedback, come on, come in the reality.............I am untrustworthy because I ask for a collateral loan? You can't be serious.  This is the sickest trust abuse I ever seen.

comments.author: suchmoon
comments.body: Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on August 04, 2023, 04:02:44 PMI for sure got more money then you got, you want to bet?Unfortunately I only take bitcoins for bets and you don't have any so I doubt that's going to work.Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on August 04, 2023, 04:02:44 PMI am untrusty worthy because I ask for a collateral loan? This is the sickest trust abuse I ever seen.You're untrustworthy for the reasons stated in my trust feedback. No amount of twisting is going to help you here so you can save your fingers and stop typing this belligerent nonsense.

comments.author: suchmoon
comments.body: Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on August 04, 2023, 04:08:49 PMI have some BTC in the wallet I have here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profileI can sign a message with that wallet if you explain how I do, but I can do it in 1 hour.I also got some more on a cold wallet. and more alt coins.I don't know what you got against me, I never see you before.So you can sign a message but you need a loan? Makes no sense.If you insist on a bet, send 0.1 BTC to LoyceV for escrow (if he agrees to this nonsense) and a signed message showing your BTC stash and I'll do the same. I don't need to know how much you have, escrow can adjudicate this. I don't see what this proves though. Surely doesn't prove you're trustworthy.Edit: Sneaky little shit edited the post. Backpedaling much? LOL

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY
comments.body: Quote from: suchmoon on August 04, 2023, 04:14:09 PMQuote from: CYBER_COWBOY on August 04, 2023, 04:08:49 PMI have some BTC in the wallet I have here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profileI can sign a message with that wallet if you explain how I do, but I can do it in 1 hour.I also got some more on a cold wallet. and more alt coins.I don't know what you got against me, I never see you before.So you can sign a message but you need a loan? Makes no sense.If you insist on a bet, send 0.1 BTC to LoyceV for escrow (if he agrees to this nonsense) and a signed message showing your BTC stash and I'll do the same. I don't need to know how much you have, escrow can adjudicate this. I don't see what this proves though. Surely doesn't prove you're trustworthy.I said I can sign a message in 1 hour. not now, I did need to loan urgent because I was not home, and I did offer collateral.It was stupid of me to speak about the bet, I apologize for that. But I am not a scammer. I have been scammed on this website once already.I would never send anyone here at this time 0.1BTC same as no one would send me 0.00001BTC. That's why I did ask for a collateral loan.I am happy to sign a message of the wallet I have in my profile it got 0.013BTC in it. Then you know I have BTC. And then please remove the feedback.But somebody need to explain for me how I can do that.Why would I even lie about this? and I how could I even scam? I just don't get it.EDIT: Stick to the point please, you said I don't have BTC. I can proof I have, you calling me a scammer, but you want me to send 0.01BTC. Don't call me a scammer or give me negative feedback if I haven't scammed anyone, and I can promise you that it never will happen.What sneaky edited? What did I edit? Ha!?!?

comments.author: suchmoon
comments.body: Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on August 04, 2023, 04:21:32 PMI would never send anyone here at this time 0.1BTC same as no one would send me 0.00001BTC. That's why I did ask for a collateral loan.A bet with an untrustworthy user here can work only via escrow. If you're not willing to send the bet amount to an escrow then even your bet offer is scammy AF, because there is no way for me to make you pay if I win. Add to that your incessant edits and it's clear that you're just blowing smoke here.Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on August 04, 2023, 04:21:32 PMI am happy to sign a message of the wallet I have in my profile it got 0.013BTC in it. Then you know I have BTC. And then please remove the feedback.Again, my feedback was posted for the reasons stated in the feedback itself. I didn't claim that you don't have BTC (edit: in the trust feedback). Nor does having BTC make you trustworthy. So no, a signed message would not result in removal of the feedback, don't bother.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on August 04, 2023, 04:32:09 PM~Thanks for this!No worries, we've got your back!Just a friendly reminder that this is all about keeping you safe. Remember, you requested a tag on your account for situations like this. If, by some chance, someone approves your loan request, don't worry about repaying it because your account has probably been hacked. Stay vigilant and protect yourself!

comments.author: Onyeeze

I don't  know the fuck some people all their mindset is to scam, assuming I have the power to tag op I would have done that before now, because its not courageous for someone to wake up and it's plan is to scam people by loan, he or her knows already that if he succeed and the account is being damaged by leaving it a series of tags that meant it did not lose on anythings, it's better to flag the account more red other future scam will desist from this act.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Well that didn't take so long OP    Farm some merit around the forum and then attempt to get a loan. You think we are that stupid?It was quite easy to know how this was going to end. All the mini loan service was just bullshit.Quote from: Onyeeze on August 04, 2023, 08:04:46 PMOnly the changes of password and email alone have shown that it's not the real owner of the account and what it wanted is to scam people in respect of loan.Or it could probably be the same person. Just changed the email and password to make it look like they had been hacked. But the main point is that he can not be trusted.

comments.author: Cantlogin
comments.created_time: August 05, 2023, 06:57:01 AMLast edit: August 05, 2023, 07:12:39 AM by Cantlogin
comments.body: You guys are really something extra, my account got hacked and I can't log in and you immediately gather together as a tough gang and start bullying, this says more about you then me.You just look like fool's you don't realize that?See you next year Wolf. You have something to stand up for, but I could bet a huge amount that you never will show up, and speaking about ALT's. I wonder how many ALT's you have?This is my second account I created. It's the second time you calling me a scammer, wait and see.Thanks for the people that actually gave me feedback because they care, but you other.. You just a bunch of nerds.You turning everything around so it suits your story then you dig your head into the sand and make up a story and use it as the truth. pathetic behaviour, it remember me of high school kid's actually.And I am very happy that I got the feedback I did.

comments.author: LoyceV

And now you can just follow the instructions for Recovering hacked/lost accounts.I'm not buying it though: the email address was changed after suchmoon left OP negative feedback.
